scripts.dev: yarn build && js-yaml ./.env.yaml > ./.env.json && NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -r ./.env.json functions-framework --source=dist --target=nextStep --port=9059
scripts.deploy: yarn build && gcloud functions deploy system-configurator --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs10 --allow-unauthenticated --max-instances=5 --region=europe-west3 --entry-point=nextStep --env-vars-file=env.yaml
